name: node-red-contrib-advanced-mopidy
description: A Node-RED node to communicate with Mopidy

scripts.precommit: npm run test-all && npm run lint
scripts.coverage: npm run coverage-clean && ./node_modules/.bin/babel-node ./node_modules/.bin/isparta cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --recursive --compilers babel:babel/register --grep 'MopidyConnected' --invert test/spec
scripts.coverage-view: npm run coverage && npm run coverage-open
scripts.coverage-all: npm run coverage-clean & ./node_modules/.bin/babel-node ./node_modules/.bin/isparta cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --recursive --compilers babel:babel/register test/spec
scripts.coverage-all-view: npm run coverage-all && npm run coverage-open
scripts.plato: ./node_modules/.bin/rimraf plato-report && ./node_modules/.bin/rimraf plato-build && ./node_modules/.bin/babel --optional runtime lib/ --out-dir plato-build && ./node_modules/.bin/plato -r -e .eslintrc-es5 -d plato-report plato-build && ./node_modules/.bin/rimraf plato-build
